segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, and she's just standing there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water is overflowing, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's nice to see the kids working together, taking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is waiting for her brother to share, it's so sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a special moment, even if they're being a bit naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees them, maybe she'll smile too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really enjoying watching the kids, they're so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is a lovely scene, even with the mess and the sneaky cookie taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile, it's just so adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really glad I got to see this moment, it's made my day better.
segments.speaker: PAR
